description.narrative: This project was approved as part of the Bank's response to the Covid-19 pandemic. To avoid delays to the delivery of this project, the Bank's President granted a deviation from the ordinary timelines for PSD disclosure, as contemplated by Section V of the Directive on Access to Information. Details of the Bank's response to Covid-19, and this deviation, can be found on our website. A senior unsecured loan of up to EUR 50 million in favour of QNB Finansbank, a universal commercial bank incorporated in Turkey. The proceeds of the loan will be channelled by QNB Finansbank to Turkish businesses with a focus on Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises ("MSMEs"). The loan is complemented by EUR 50 million trade finance line to support the lender's trade finance activities.
